about_the_game:
Welcome to a space adventure like you've never seen before! In “V2 Cucumber Scam” you'll play the role of Mac Skin, a former captain of an interplanetary merchant ship who, instead of serving a 20-year sentence for space crimes, agreed to undergo experimental echomutation. He was given sensory abilities, but at the cost of mandatory service on a remote station in the Verdun belt.

Your routine work turns into a real challenge when a mysterious anomaly over the planet V2 forces you into action. V2 is the place where the “Cucumbers” - a strange new species that has caused more trouble than good for Earth - were exiled. Now the planet hides secrets that no one wants to touch. But you must.

After your ship malfunctions, you land on V2. From that moment the real struggle for survival and discovery of the truth begins. The game combines elements of Adventure and Colony Builder - you build colonies, hack devices, explore the planet, collect resources, hunt unknown species and solve puzzles. All this in a unique 2D pixel art, hand-drawn style that comes to life on your screen.

Embark on this humorous, sarcastic and full of surprises adventure. On V2 you'll not only face a battle for survival, but also for sanity. Will you discover what the Cucumbers are hiding before it's too late?

STATEMENT

You are entering a world where the line between truth, conspiracy theory and legend can be dangerously fluid.

What really crashed at Roswell?
What is the role of the base at Area 51?
Where do the circles in the grain come from?
Why are cows found with their organs cut out in fields?One day I was contacted by a person whose identity remains unknown. She claimed to have information that could shed light on UFO-related events. The contact was through a regular e-mail box, which soon ceased to exist. Faced with these puzzles, I decided to put the acquired information in the game “V2 Cucumber Scam”, hiding it in special missions. Players may discover this content, but as the author I declare that I take no responsibility for its authenticity. This is a story for thought, not for resolution. Many of the threads are artistic interpretation and literary fiction, but each is rooted in speculation that has intrigued researchers and mystery enthusiasts for years. Names of institutions, people and places have been changed or distorted to protect privacy and avoid unintended repercussions.

short_description: Former Captain Mac Skin, convicted of contraband, lands on the planet V2 after a ship malfunction. Your task is to survive, discover the secrets of the “Cucumbers” and build a colony in a humorous pixel art adventure. Adventure & Colony Builder in one - “V2 Cucumber Scam” awaits!
